requirements.description: Pollfish's Services are not intended for children under the age of 16, and it is represented that your Platform also does not target children under 16.
You must comply with the U.S. Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) and ensure this compliance throughout the service term.
Your Privacy Policy must inform users about the privacy rights of minors under applicable laws.
You must make reasonable efforts to verify the age of users and avoid collecting data from children under the age of 16.
You must not knowingly share data of users under the age of 16 with Pollfish.
If Pollfish detects a user under the age of 16, it will block that user from its Services.
